page.title: 04BLYTH RECOLLECTIONS. (3)
page.content: {Entertainment before television.} The entertainment was travelling plays and films and also home produced entertainment. { {People's shopping.} People did their shopping at the co-op.{ { {Effect the motor way has on Blyth.} It attracts people who come for meals and drinks. { {Jobs 60 years ago.} The jobs 60 years ago have changed alot they worked at the hall and for farmers and then the pit. { {Education.} Education was at Blyth school and in 1930 people who were selected went on to Retford or Worksop.
